channel.title: 718 - unpack npcspawns
channel.description:
Hey guys, I'm having trouble with adding a few npcs (that will actually respawn). I was just wondering if anyone has the code for a tool that will take all the packed npc spawns and place them into an unpacked format.
If I can't do this, I'll have to create my own and list all the current npc spawns, which will take forever. I've tried the .java file, but they won't respawn. :/
Please help.
EDIT: Ignore this, please remove.
